title: karam22
author: karam22
content: Do not enter for pumping and dumping setsPump and dump is a tactic or strategy used by a group of famous or influential people in a particular field to generate hype and bustle to get many people to buy the target cryptocurrency at the same time.By doing so, the price of the pump-and-dump target cryptocurrency rises exponentially, and this enables the organizers of this tactic to sell out and leave everyone hanging at a higher price.This practice is illegal in the cryptocurrency and physical markets.Therefore, we advise that you should stay away from it to keep your cryptocurrencies safe. Organizers may tempt you to participate by promising big returns. But the truth is that only the regulators will benefit from it.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: karam22 on April 11, 2023, 01:22:32 PMThis practice is illegal in the cryptocurrency and physical markets.After many illegal doings are criminalized, crypto is still under-regulated, because crypto is not well regulated, no law against pump and dump projects in many nations if not in almost all nations that there is no such law. That is why you may still see pump and dump projects like this and no one arrested. Buy bitcoin or other reputed coins with huge marketcap instead of gambling with your money. But some altcoins with huge marketcap can also becoming nothing in some minutes, just like Luna, UST and FTT token. See altcoins as gambling, but they can give more ROI, invest just very little amount of money on altcoins.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on April 12, 2023, 08:50:34 AM See altcoins as gambling, but they can give more ROI, invest just very little amount of money on altcoins.That is if you must, but it is not a must to hodl altcoins as a cryptocurrency user. Just as said, if you know you do not have the money to gamble with investing in altcoins, just stick to buying and investing in bitcoins that is a bit more surer. Many people have been victims of pump and dump schemes just as a few lucky persons have benefited from it because they were not greedy and knew that they had to take profit from the altcoin while it is pumping instead of making the mistake that some people do of wanting to see how high the pump will get. As a crypto user, if you must invest in altcoins, know that pump and dump is very possible, so always know when to take profit.
